page.title: 08HOMELIFE:SCHOOL
page.content: A day in the life of Paul Smith aged 12 at7.30.I woke up and at8.10 I got up and got dressed.I played some music,The Iron Maiden group.At 8.30 I had my breakfast,rice krispies with milk and sugar.At 8.45 I walked to {school}.At 9.00 we had registration and at 9.05 there was an unusual assembly it was a play instead of the usual story and reading.At9.30 I went to my first lesson French.History was the next lesson and we continued our project on China.At10.40 till 11.00 it was break time and I chatted with my friends.11.00to12.10 was Mathematics.At 12.10 I had my sandwiches.At12.20 I played football it was usual sides and we won 4-3.At1.10 we had registration. At1.20 we had PE we did the shotputt and discus.At2.30 we had English and I handed in my project.At3.45 I went home.
